entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Fog patches. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
